articles.author: Orla McCaffrey, Will Feuer
articles.title: Bank of America to Cut Overdraft Fees to $10 From $35 - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Regulators, politicians have been pressuring banks on fees; JPMorgan, Ally Financial have already announced changes
articles.content:
Bank of America Corp. said Tuesday it would cut overdraft fees to $10 from $35 beginning in May, following other big banks that have rolled back or ditched such charges.
Overdraft fees, which are ch… [+482 chars]

articles.author: Barbara Miller
articles.title: Omicron is forcing many Americans to dump their cloth masks for N95s. Should Australians follow? - ABC News
articles.description: With Omicron sweeping the world, many experts say it's time to dump the cloth mask. The best masks to protect you are already available, but here's what you should do if your local pharmacist is out of N95 masks.
articles.content:
Cloth masks quickly became a staple of the pandemic, a bright splash of colour in otherwise grim times. 
However, the humble face covering is in danger of becoming Omicron's latest casualty.
In the… [+7201 chars]

articles.title: Common Cold Can Protect Against Coronavirus, Study Finds - Voice of America
articles.description: U.S adults usually catch one or two common colds a year. They’re usually little more than an annoyance, but new research suggests they may offer some protection from a virus that’s much more dangerous. Henry Ridgwell reports from London.
